sentence.Network_en: Shudderingly , she acknowledged to herself that she dared not face what lay before her.
sentence.Network_cn: 她害怕地发抖, 她承认自己不敢面对眼前的一切.

sentences.sentence: "shudderingly, she acknowledged to herself that she dared not face what lay before her"

auth_sentence.content: Yet I have to admit that this Mahler Five was spine-shudderingly good.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet I have to admit that this Mahler Five was spine-shudderingly good.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet I have to admit that this Mahler Five was spine-shudderingly good.
